, such as shifting procurement or adopting new policies on foreign exchange, Sergio Marchionne said. ''Any knee-jerk reaction to currency moves can force a readjustment and that can be quite expensive,'' Sergio Marchionne said. For Chrysler, it is a great thing to the extent that other currencies have experienced a strong position relative to the US dollar. For European operations, ''it's a bind,'' he said. '' But in this week's Arts& Leisure section, Jon Caramanica argues that the Aerosmith frontman's wacky charisma has ably replaced Simon Cowell 's caustic derision as the show's signature quality. Simon Cowell Steven Tyler , who will turn 63 next month, has done much of the heavy lifting for ''Idol' this season, Simon Cowell Caramanica writes, ''helping keep the show within striking distance of last season's ratings and ensuring that even though certain things have been lost in transition, the show still has a steady center.'''
